free.chess
Class VectorPiecePainter

java.lang.Object
  free.chess.VectorPiecePainter
All Implemented Interfaces:
ColoredPiecePainter, PiecePainter
Direct Known Subclasses:
free.chess.art.EboardVectorPiecePainter
public abstract class VectorPiecePainter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ColoredPiecePainter

An abstract class offering a convenient partial implementation for vector based piece sets.

getPreferredPieceSize
 

Constructor Detail

VectorPiecePainter

public VectorPiecePainter()
Creates a new VectorPiecePainter. White pieces will be drawn with white black pieces with black.

VectorPiecePainter

public VectorPiecePainter(java.awt.Color whiteColor,
                          java.awt.Color blackColor)
Creates a new VectorPiecePainter which will draw white and black pieces using the given colors. The outline of the pieces will have an RGB value reverse to the RGB values of the given colors (if the color for the white pieces is for example R=255 G=128 B=0 then the outline of the white pieces will be R=0 G=127 B=255).

Parameters:
whiteColor - The color for the white pieces.
blackColor - The color for the black pieces.

VectorPiecePainter

public VectorPiecePainter(java.awt.Color whiteColor,
                          java.awt.Color blackColor,
                          java.awt.Color whiteOutline,
                          java.awt.Color blackOutline)
Creates a new VectorPiecePainter which will produce white and black pieces with the given colors and the given outline colors.

Parameters:
whiteColor - The color for the white pieces.
blackColor - The color for the black pieces.
whiteOutline - The color for the outline of white pieces.
blackOutline - The color for the outline of black pieces.
